channel.title: Packages that are Different from Slackware :: Salix Documentation
channel.description: Here is a list of packages, present in both Salix and Slackware repositories and the reasons Salix is using a different build: Salix 15.0 elilo: Minor tweaks to eliloconfig. lilo: Salix artwork. Minor tweaks to liloconfig. meson: Newer version so that updated versions of other packages can be built. mozilla-firefox: Using the latest ESR version. sysvinit-scripts: Tweaked for boot speedup. Colorized boot messages. Autostart feature for every executable file in /etc/rc.
